meanings.definition: A woman who is attracted to other women.
meanings.sent1: She discovered she was a sapphists after falling in love with her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The community center welcomed all sapphists to join their support group.
meanings.sent3: The sapphists at the party all wore matching rainbow bracelets.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient tale, the sapphists were celebrated for their bravery and love.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful portrait of two sapphists holding hands under the moonlight.
